idea:
Oceantrade Maritime is a truly self-reliant (Atmanirbhar) Indian International Maritime Business Company.


We are a Blue Economy specialised company, creating various Business to Business (B2B) platforms to some of the core Maritime Segments within the Industry. We intend to work very closely with the various Stakeholders of the Maritime Industry such as Maritime Trade Bodies, Industry Associations, Clusters, Maritime Boards, Central & State Government Ministries, Bodies and Authorities for the development and growth of the Indian Maritime Industry, while planning and organising various Maritime Industry focused Portfolios, Projects and Programs.
name: Oceantrade Media Private Limited

idea:
HealthyHey Nutrition is one of the leading company offering Nutritional supplements to promote a healthy life. We empower people to lead healthy lives by providing the best selection of dietary supplements, sports nutrition and nutritional supplements. We always focus on the quality and excellence, this makes us unique in the market.
